page.title: 14Eaglesfield Gala Day
page.content: The culmination of the Gala {festivities}comes on Gala Day which is always the last Saturday in June. Gala committee members are up early anxious to see if the weather will be kind. Many folk are involved getting tents, tables, chairs and loudspeaker systems into place while others don their {fancy dress}and put the finishing touches to the decorated cars and lorries, ready for the judging at the village hall.The competitors then parade along the street led by the pipe band and followed by majorettes. The afternoon's{entertainment}on the Playing Fields include{sports,}stalls and demonstrations with refreshments at the tea and beer tents. The announcement of event winners and prize giving round off the afternoon. The day is seen out at the Gala Dance held in the Village Hall.
